welcome.title: Welcome to Basketball Clip Cutter
welcome.subtitle: Perfect for creating and organizing basketball clips for team scouting

loadVideo.title: Load Video
loadVideo.description: Select your basketball game video file

markClips.title: Mark Clips
markClips.description: Use I and O keys to mark in/out points during playback

categorize.title: Categorize
categorize.description: Tag clips with custom categories (Rebounds, Screens, Player actions, etc.)

share.title: Share
share.description: Export clips by category to share with your team

settings.confirmReset: Are you sure? This will delete all clips and reset categories to default. This action cannot be undone.

categories.title: Manage Categories
categories.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this category? This will not delete existing clips.
categories.errorCreating: Error creating category. Name might already exist.
categories.errorUpdating: Error updating category. Name might already exist.

presets.title: Category Presets
presets.description: Save your category layouts as reusable templates for different scouting scenarios. Create multiple presets like 'Opponent Scouting', 'Player Development', 'Team Analysis', etc.
presets.saveCurrentCategories: Save Current Categories as New Preset
presets.loadDescription: Click any preset below to load its category structure into your current project:
presets.createFirstPreset: Create your first preset by building categories above, then save them with a descriptive name.
presets.saveSuccess: Preset saved successfully! You can now load it in any project.
presets.confirmLoad: Are you sure you want to load the preset '{{presetName}}'? This will replace your current categories.
presets.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete the preset '{{presetName}}'? This action cannot be undone.

clips.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this clip?
clips.confirmDeleteClip: Are you sure you want to delete this clip? The video file will be permanently deleted.

creator.title: Clip Title
creator.errorMarkPoints: Please mark in and out points on the video first.
creator.markInOutRequired: Please mark in and out points on the video first.
creator.errorSelectCategory: Please select at least one category for this clip.
creator.categoryRequired: Please select at least one category for this clip.
creator.errorCreating: Error creating clip. Please try again.
creator.errorNoWriteAccess: Cannot write to clips folder. Please check your Documents folder permissions.
creator.errorInsufficientSpace: Not enough disk space to create the clip.
creator.errorFileNotFound: Input video file not found or is not accessible.
creator.errorFFmpegFailed: Video processing failed. The video file may be corrupted or unsupported.
creator.errorDatabaseFailed: Failed to save clip information to database.
creator.errorThumbnailFailed: Failed to create thumbnail for the clip.
creator.errorInvalidDuration: Invalid clip duration. Please check your mark in/out points.
creator.errorInvalidTime: Invalid time values. Please mark valid in/out points.
creator.errorInvalidTitle: Invalid clip title. Please provide a valid title.
creator.errorNoCategories: No categories selected. Please select at least one category.
creator.errorAfterRetries: Failed to create clip after multiple attempts: {{translationKey}}

systemCheck.error_ffmpeg_not_found: FFmpeg not found. Video processing is not available.
systemCheck.error_documents_not_accessible: Cannot access Documents folder. Please check folder permissions.
systemCheck.error_no_write_access: No write access to clips folder. Please check permissions.
systemCheck.error_system_check_failed: System check failed. Please try again.
systemCheck.warning_low_disk_space: Warning: Low disk space (less than 1GB available).

creator.unsupportedFormat: Unsupported video format: {{format}}. Please use MP4, AVI, MOV, MKV, WMV, FLV, WebM, or M4V.

video.selectVideoPrompt: Please select a video file to get started

timeSearch.tooltip: Enter time in HH:MM:SS, MM:SS, or seconds format to jump to that moment
timeSearch.enterTime: Please enter a time to jump to
timeSearch.invalidFormat: Invalid time format. Use HH:MM:SS, MM:SS, or seconds (e.g., 1:23:45, 12:30, 150)
